instruction: Select ripe, firm tomatoes and slice them into thick slices.
Cut the fresh mozzarella into thick slices.
Wash and separate the basil leaves.
Arrange alternating layers of tomato, mozzarella, and basil on a serving platter.
Drizzle generously with extra virgin olive oil.
Drizzle with balsamic vinegar to taste.
Season with salt and black pepper to taste.
